name: DIGITAL EXORCIST case_(0);
description:
DEFRAG. DESTROY. DELIVER.


Digital Exorcist is a story-rich horror adventure game/visual novel inspired by Japanese adventure classics like Snatcher, Policenauts and The Silver Case.
As a Digital Exorcist, you will first need to investigate and piece together the crime, and then exorcise the demon responsible with a variety of tools.
  • Explore four spine-chilling locations, including a spooky deep web forum.
  • Build a thought cabinet by finding clues, and use them to reconstruct the crime scene.
  • Fight demons by using holy items (or just shoot them).
  • Solve intuitive puzzles with the help of your trusty computerized sidekick, Tomodachi.
  • Dive into a dark and gruesome world designed and drawn pixel by pixel.
  • Listen to a boppin' soundtrack using classic digital synthesizers.
